lead_paragraph: Trump Entertainment Resorts received U.S. Bankruptcy Court approval on Wednesday for an agreement that gives it 30 days to craft a cost-cutting turnaround plan to save its Taj Mahal casino-hotel from liquidation.

headline.main: Trump Entertainment Begins Race to Save Atlantic City Casino
headline.print_headline: Trump Entertainment Begins Race to Save Atlantic City Casino
